metadata.title: CVE-2016-0819 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Qualcomm performance component in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.x before5.1.1 LMY49H, and 6.x before 2016-03-01 allows attackers to gain privilegesvia a crafted application, aka internal bug 25364034.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
